Manchester United legend Gary Neville has slammed the Glazer family for their 'negligent' ownership of the club.

articles.title: Harlee Dean: Birmingham City defender bears no grudges to ex-boss Lee Bowyer - BBC
articles.description: Birmingham City defender Harlee Dean has no hard feelings towards ex-boss Lee Bowyer after playing his first game for the club in 11 months.
articles.content:
Harlee Dean has made 187 for Birmingham since joning from Brentford in August 2017
